### Как создать секрет

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# openssl genrsa -out cert.key 4096

Generating RSA private key, 4096 bit long modulus (2 primes)
...................................++++
...................................................................................................................................++++
e is 65537 (0x010001)
```

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# openssl req -x509 -new -key cert.key -days 3650 -out cert.crt \
-subj '/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/CN=server.local'
```

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=./cert.crt --key=./cert.key

secret/domain-cert created
```

### Как просмотреть список секретов

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secrets
NAME                                            TYPE                                  DATA   AGE
default-token-bl7hz                             kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      51d
domain-cert                                     kubernetes.io/tls                     2      53s
nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-f2zc9   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      24d
postgres-secrets                                Opaque                                2      32d
sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1                helm.sh/release.v1                    1      24d
```

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secret
NAME                                            TYPE                                  DATA   AGE
default-token-bl7hz                             kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      51d
domain-cert                                     kubernetes.io/tls                     2      61s
nfs-server-nfs-server-provisioner-token-f2zc9   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3      24d
postgres-secrets                                Opaque                                2      32d
sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1                helm.sh/release.v1                    1      24d
```

### Как просмотреть секрет

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secret domain-cert
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      6m3s
```

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl describe secret domain-cert
Name:         domain-cert
Namespace:    default
Labels:       <none>
Annotations:  <none>

Type:  kubernetes.io/tls

Data
====
tls.crt:  1944 bytes
tls.key:  3243 bytes
```

### Как получить информацию в формате YAML и/или JSON

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
apiVersion: v1
data:
  tls.crt: 
  tls.key: 
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2022-06-05T10:58:10Z"
  name: domain-cert
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "204284"
  uid: f19f75a4-8c8f-4723-b9e6-c0098ecdbcff
type: kubernetes.io/tls
```

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "data": {
        "tls.crt": "",
        "tls.key": ""
    },
    "kind": "Secret",
    "metadata": {
        "creationTimestamp": "2022-06-05T10:58:10Z",
        "name": "domain-cert",
        "namespace": "default",
        "resourceVersion": "204284",
        "uid": "f19f75a4-8c8f-4723-b9e6-c0098ecdbcff"
    },
    "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
}
```

### Как выгрузить секрет и сохранить его в файл

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secrets -o json > secrets.json
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml > domain-cert.yml
```
```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# ls -l
total 56
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  1944 Jun  5 10:56 cert.crt
-rw------- 1 root root  3243 Jun  5 10:56 cert.key
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  7165 Jun  5 11:01 domain-cert.yml
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 37497 Jun  5 11:01 secrets.json
```

### Как удалить секрет

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl delete secret domain-cert

secret "domain-cert" deleted
```

### Как загрузить секрет из файла?

```
root@cp1:/home/user/ssl# kubectl apply -f domain-cert.yml

secret/domain-cert created
```
